page.title: 14FACILITIES IN RINGLEY
page.content: {RINGLEY}IS ONLY A SMALL VILLAGE AND HAS VERY FEW{FACILITIES.} IT HAS ONLY ONE SHOP,WHICH SELLS GENERAL GROCERIES AND MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL TO{FARNWORTH}OR{RADCLIFFE}TO DO THEIR WEEKLY SHOPPING. THE NEAREST{DOCTOR}AND{CHEMIST}IS JUST OVER A{MILE}AWAY. THERE IS NO BUS SERVICE ACTUALLY IN THE VILLAGE ALTHOUGH THERE IS ONE ON THE MAIN ROAD NEARBY. A{MOBILE LIBRARY}AND{MOBILE {GREENGROCER }BOTH VISIT THE VILLAGE. THE NEAREST{SPORTS CENTRE}IS SEVERAL MILES AWAY,AND{RESIDENTS}HAVE TO GO TO FARNWORTH OR RADCLIFFE TO SWIM. DESPITE THIS LACK OF{AMENITIES}THE VILLAGERS DO NOT REALLY WANT ANY CHANGE AS THEY BELIEVE THAT THIS WOULD SPOIL THE CHARACTER OF{RINGLEY.} YOUNGER{ONES}WOULD LIKE MORE FACILITIES FOR CHILDREN.
